"She went. Suddenly there was a great wind. The girl lost her hat and her long hair came down. . . ." Here he could contain himself no longer and went on, between gasps of laugh- ter: "And the whole world knew. . . ." 
And so the anecdote ended. Though it was unintelligible why he had told it, or why it had to be told in Russian, still Anna Pdvlovna and the others appreciated Prince Hippolyte's social tact in so agreeably en
